org.cloudifysource.esc.installer
Class EnvironmentFileBuilder

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudifysource.esc.installer.EnvironmentFileBuilder

public class EnvironmentFileBuilder
extends Object

A simple wrapper around a StringBuilder. Used to generate the contents of the cloudify environment file that is injected into the remote cloudify installation

Since:
2.5.0
Author:
dank, barakme

Method Detail

normalizeCifsPath

public static String normalizeCifsPath(String str)
Given a path of the type /C$/PATH - indicating an absolute cifs path, returns /PATH. If the string does not match, returns the original unmodified string.

Parameters:
str - the input path.
Returns:
the input path, adjusted to remove the cifs drive letter, if it exists, or the original path if the drive letter is not present.

normalizeCygwinPath

public static String normalizeCygwinPath(String str)
Normalizes a cygwin path to a standard windows path, where a cygwin path is any string that starts with '/cygwin/'. Other strings are not changed.

Parameters:
str - the original value.
Returns:
the normalized string.

exportVar

public EnvironmentFileBuilder exportVar(String name,
                                        String value,
                                        boolean append)
Adds an environment variable to the command line.

Parameters:
name - variable name.
value - variable value.
append - true if the variable value should be appended to the current one, false otherwise.
Returns:
this.
